snippet: Former Gov. Angus King has a strong lead in the race to fill Olympia Snowe’s Senate seat, but it has made him an early punching bag.
abstract: Former Maine Gov Angus King, an independent, has a strong lead in the race to fill Olympia Snowe’s Senate seat, but it has made him an early punching bag; Maine is suddenly one of a handful of states that could determine the balance of power in the Senate.
lead_paragraph: Former Gov. Angus King has a strong lead in the race to fill Olympia Snowe’s Senate seat, but it has made him an early punching bag.

headline.seo: Former Gov. Angus King Leads Maine Senate Race
headline.main: Maine Race Complicates Struggle for the Senate
headline.print_headline: Maine Race Complicates Struggle for the Senate
